snippet: Andy Murray and Kei Nishikori tend to linger when they get together. Their latest matchup set a record....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray and Kei Nishikori tend to linger when they get together. Their latest matchup set a record.

headline.print_headline: ATP Finals: Murray Edges Nishikori, Wawrinka KOs Cilic
